DOC.brief_summary: To assess reproducibility Spectral-Domain-OCT ( SD-OCT ) retinal nerve fiber layer thickness ( RNFL ) thickness measurement healthy volunteer patient glaucoma compare result conventional Time-Domain-OCT ( TD-OCT ) . - Trial medical device
DOC.brief_title: Reproducibility Nerve Fiber Layer Thickness Measurements Patients With Glaucoma Healthy Controls Using Spectral-Domain Time-Domain OCT
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : control group : age 18yo old , healthy glaucom group : age 18yo old , diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma ( POAG ) Exclusion criterion : Exclusion criterion control group history glaucoma , history ocular disease , intraocular pressure great 21mmHg . Exclusion criterion glaucoma group history optic neuropathy . severe optic medium opacity .
